request_id.description: RequestID is a UUID of a request so we can correlate requests with response on one stream.

resource_name.description: Name of the resource on which we execute kuma-dp clusters request.

resource_mesh.description: Mesh of the resource on which we execute kuma-dp clusters request. Should be empty for ZoneIngress, ZoneEgress.

ClustersRequest.title: Clusters Request
ClustersRequest.description: ClustersRequest is a request for kuma-dp clusters that is executed on Zone CP.
